tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had gone to Dr Aarushi to consult for my dad, who was in pain. She not only correctly diagnosed his problem  but also suggested the best recourse to ease his suffering. My dad has a number of ailments and she took the utmost care to ensure he got the suitable treatment which would not interfere or hamper his health. Thanks to her, my father got his ailing tooth removed with nearly painless extraction. I highly recommend her, especially if the patient is suffering from high BP and diabetes as she will ensure your experience is wonderful.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Zirconia Crowns,Oral Prophylaxis,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I got many procedures done from Dr. Aarushi. All the procedures from scaling, RCT till prosthesis everything went smooth. She is very professional yet polite, precise and concerned about patient comfort all the time. * **** ******** ******* I would recommend her for all dental care procedures.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: To be honest, I had certain apprehensions while visiting but all my apprehensions were set aside once she started with the procedure...thank you Dr. Arushi for the wonderful painless experience. I’ll surely recommend anyone to her for any dental related issues. She’s really polite and meticulous in her job! Thank you again doctor!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Just wonderful and satisfying experience  The  Docter satisfied all my queries .She helped me decide line of treatment  and was extremely convincing.. After the treatment too  the feeling of being trated well in my budget  was all too good
Overall  just wonderful

The Doctor is soft spoken and places special emphasis on patient's comfort. The best thing is she explains your options and pros and cons of procedures so that you can take an informed decision. The RCTs are well managed and the doctor herself tells you the do's and dont's. They also have speciliased medics available for different procedures. Please go ahead for an appointment and see for yourself.

Last week I went for my root canal procedure with Dr Aarushi. She was humble *** **************The procedure went well and the Dr took utmost care from start to end of the treatment.She seemed highly professional in her approach. I would recommend her for any dental issues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I had wonderful experience in Truheal Dental Clinic. Specially with Dr. Aarushi and her dental assistant.Dr. Aarushi worked on my cleaning and filling.The procedure went well and without pain. ********** ** ***** ******* ** *** ****** She is well deserved, experienced , professionally sound and dedicated doctor. Truheal Dental Clinic is very inviting. Thanks for a pleasurable experience *** **** ********** I truly recommend Dr.Aarushi ** ** ********* ********

reply_text: Thank you so much sir for your kind words and appreciation.

review: Dr aarushi is has one of the blessed hands, painless treatment is her priority. Her explanation of the issue is so detailed and proper that one would readily say yes to all the treatment suggested. I got my treatment done and also got my other family members here too who had some dental issues. She is go to Doctor for all dental problems. Highly commendable

review:
I highly commend Dr. Aarushi, it’s not often that conventional doctors invest much time in patient’s wellbeing, but Dr. Aarushi's eminent work and devotion towards not only treatment but wellness is extraordinary and admirable.
She ensured restoration of vigour and vitality after cure and tended me with great empathy.
Dr. Aarushi should be rewarded for her monumental work and integrity. 

Thank you for Scaling & Polishing :-)
